sentences.en: [ Ray ] I definitely started equating crossword puzzles with songwriting.
sentences.cn: 我已经干脆开始把字谜游戏等同于歌曲写作了.

sentences.en: Don't chuck yesterday's paper out. I still haven't done the crossword.
sentences.cn: 别扔了昨天的报纸. 我还没做字谜游戏呢.

sentences.en: For recreation he wrote poetry and solved crossword puzzles.
sentences.cn: 他把写诗和做填字游戏当做消遣.

sentences.en: He shows a great interest in crossword puzzles.
sentences.cn: 他对填字游戏表现出很大兴趣.

sentences.en: He wouldn't dream of reading detective stories or crossword puzzles after tea.
sentences.cn: 他才不会想到在喝完茶后就去读什么侦探小说或玩拼字游戏的事.

sentences.en: I am totally bewildered by the clues to this crossword puzzle.
sentences.cn: 这个纵横字谜的提示完全把我弄糊涂了.

sentences.en: I can't do the crossword today I must be losing my touch.
sentences.cn: 我今天填不出这纵横字谜了--一定是本事不济了.

sentences.en: I can't do the crossword today I must is losing my touch.
sentences.cn: 我今天填不出这纵横字谜了一定是本事不济了.

sentences.en: I got together a few friends of mine - crossword - constructing friends - to be the officials.
sentences.cn: 我找了几个搞字谜创作的朋友一起作为官方人员.

sentences.en: I like to sit down and do the crossword .
sentences.cn: 我喜欢坐下来做纵横字谜游戏。

sentences.en: I think the crossword puzzle is too difficult for me.
sentences.cn: 我认为这个纵横字谜对我来说太难了.

sentences.en: She tried to solve a crossword puzzle.
sentences.cn: 她试着解答一道纵横字谜.

sentences.en: That's why it does crossword puzzles and builds atom bombs.
sentences.cn: 这也是它能够解谜语和制造原子弹的原因.
那个纵横字谜使我困惑不解.

sentences.en: This crossword will really tax your brain.
sentences.cn: 这纵横字谜真能让人大伤脑筋.

sentences.en: Will you help me with this crossword puzzle? It got me stumped.
sentences.cn: 你帮我解这个纵横字谜好 吗 ?它难住我了.

trans.tran_en: a word game in which you write the answers to questions in a pattern of numbered boxes
